title: [Large-scale] Instructional Design-Based Language Learning Experience Development for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate language proficiency and grasp of instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Learner-centered design emphasizing task applicability for current practitioners. Development of strategic learning experiences for comprehensive assessments

learning_goals: Learners analyze language learning materials (3 texts, 2 videos) provided within a week and submit a design proposal meeting four or more of five checklist items for material design (aligned with theme, difficulty, and learner level).
Develop three types of learner-customized activity scenarios applying teacher-led design principles.

Learners design one beginner-level Korean conversation education module within a week, incorporating all instructional design elements (objectives, assessments, materials, methods), and submit a final output meeting eight or more of ten provided checklist items.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
